programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: A small family of wild dogs is on the run desperately looking for a safe place to raise six, tiny puppies, but the Savage Kingdom will test them to the limit. The sanctuary they seek is filled with rivals who stand in their way and predators who want to eat their puppies. Only the resolve of their dedicated leaders, Teemana and Malao, can save them..

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Not all lions in the Savage Kingdom are born equal while the Marsh Pride dominates the beating heart of the realm, the three lionesses of the Northern Pride struggle to hold their ground in the forests and hills. Once a great pride, their sons have been banished, and if they can't rebuild their pride they face hunger, exile or worse..

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Matsumi, has ascended to become Queen of the Marsh Pride. An unrivalled hunter, she has yet to prove herself as the leader of the dynasty that controls the beating heart of her Savage Kingdom the Great Marsh. Her rivals and The Kingdoms brutal climate do everything they can to bring her clan to its knees. Will the price of success be too high for the Marsh Pride to pay?.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: On a forsaken ridge of sand that skirts the edge of the Savage Kingdom, a hyena queen, Zalika, plots her revenge on the Marsh Lions who keep her clan in exile. Zalika is building an army and when she has the numbers she will confront the Marsh Pride once and for all. No longer will the hyenas eke out an existence in the shadows..

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Surprises come in all scrapes and sizes. A cockatiel has a tweaked beak and Dr. Lisa ponders a barn cats bladder leak. When a Chihuahua arrives after hours with an eye emergency, Doc remains focused. A serious blemish surfaces on a show dog and a hoarse horse struggles to breathe. Everyone comes together to make Dianes birthday extra special.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol treats three bovines and one tiny rabbit before heading to the Netherlands with Diane to celebrate his 80th birthday. Just because the Docs away, it doesnt mean that the clinic slows down. A very vocal pig needs surgery to treat a hernia, a blocked cat is in pain and requires immediate relief, and a puppy is feeling the effects of eating something inedible. .

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes. This is where the action plays out. Each event is unpacked and explained, offering a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Hungry crocs battle a dangerous pod of hippos. The hippos take on a group of male lions. A honey badger battles for life against leopards, and wild dogs cause chaos everywhere they go! In the wilds of Southern Africa, the long, dry winter brings a desperation to the animals who live here. Prepare yourself for a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: She haunts the trees and hills in the heart of the realm. She is solitary, silent and virtually invisible. Saba the leopard is a killer without rival. Saba is the most spectacular and resourceful hunter the Savage Kingdom has seen. Her stronghold, Leopard Rock, sits at the heart of this brutal realm it is a place where she can vanish into the shadows and avoid running into her rivals lions, hyenas and wild dogs.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands
programme.desc: Rivalry defines all life in the forests of the Iberian Peninsula. The arrival of summer marks the beginning of what will be a prolonged period of drought in the region, making survival even more difficult for the animals who call this place home. Every creature must fight for limited resources ‚Äì making competition both within and between species unavoidable.

programme.title: Austria's Wild Heritage - One Country Six National
programme.desc: The first part explains the beginnings of the national parks in Austria, which were characterized by the visions of a few pioneers and the civil disobedience of many. One remembers the occupation of a floodplain in the conflict over the construction of a power station or protests against building a cannon firing range. But of course, this production also knows how to inspire with fascinating nature stories and animal shots. .
